page.title: 10Sandhills CP School
page.content: In the school there are 6 class teachers, 2 helpers, 1 secretary and 1 caretaker. The headmaster has been at this school for 8 years. There 4 dinner ladies and 3 cooks in the school canteen.The school is 45 years old. The main events in the school year are: Harvest Festival: Harvest things are brought for a special assembly for parents. Fresh things are sold for charity and the rest is taken to local old people. Christmas: Usually a school performance of music and drama-often the Nativity. Sports Day: Races for all the children, mums, dads and toddlers. Music Evening: Music is provided by children singing, recorder groups guitar groups playing. Folk Dance Evening: All the classes learn folk dances to perform for parents.
